hackathon-description-text: We are proud to announce the first Meteor web and mobile app hackathon in Shanghai. We are going to deep dive into MeteorJS and build full-stack apps from scratch.
hackathon-rules:
24 hours to code from first commit on github
Coding ends at 2pm on Sunday.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Panyu Road 1199 Long No.4, Xuhui, Shanghai, China, 200030
hackathon-location-address: Panyu Road 1199 Long No.4, Xuhui, Shanghai, China, 200030
hackathon-description-header: Use Meteor to build great apps in 24h!
